AbilityDef.label: cognitive shield
AbilityDef.description:
Envelop all allied pawns in a powerful mental barrier that shields them from damage and mental manipulation. All colonists gain enhanced psychic sensitivity and resistance to mental breaks for 25 seconds.

Base effects (all pawns):
• +25% psychic sensitivity
• -30% incoming mental/psychic damage
• -20% stun chance
• +15% mental break threshold

Scaling thresholds (based on each pawn's psychic sensitivity):
• ≥3.0: -10% all incoming damage, +10% consciousness (base, scales +1% per 0.2)
• ≥5.0: Immunity to panic/confusion/hallucination effects (base, scales +1% per 0.2)
• ≥8.0: 25% reflect psychic damage, +50% heal rate (base, scales +1% per 0.2)

The shield adapts to each pawn's natural psychic attunement, becoming more powerful for those with higher sensitivity.

"A fortified mind cannot be broken."
